subject: Sales
title: Blue Ocean Strategy
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Blue Ocean Strategy.

hook.text: Cirque du Soleil didn't fight other circuses. It created an entirely new category and owned it alone.

buildup.text: Blue ocean strategy means creating uncontested space instead of battling in bloody red oceans.

discovery.text: Most profit growth comes from creating new markets rather than fighting for share in existing ones.

twist.text: Blue oceans are temporary. Competitors follow fast once they see success. Speed is the real advantage.

climax.text: Look for what your market doesn't offer. Create the category before anyone else knows it exists.

punchline.text: Don't fight where everyone else fights. Create new space.

quiz.question: What is a 'blue ocean' in business strategy?
options: Uncontested market space with no direct competition
A market dominated by one player
